results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Pink Flower Machine Embroidered Bathroom Hand Towel
results.description: This hand towel has an embroidered graphic of one full bloomed pink flower in the middle with green leaves all down the side of it with 3 sprays of greenery branches going across it with small pink flowers at the top of each one.  The words live, laugh, love are underneath the flower design.  The embroidery colors are 2 shades of green, pink, orange, and red.  The color of the towel is white. The towel size is 16 inches wide x 26 inches long. It is a cotton towel. The graphic is embroidered in the middle panel of the bottom of the towel so you can see it when you hang it up. You can hang it up in your bathroom for decorative purposes or use to wipe your hands on it. The embroidery graphic sewn on the towel has a tear away stabilizer that it is sewn over. I can get out most of the stabilizer when I use my scissors sometimes I cannot get it all and do not want to force it off and ruin the towel. It does come off as you wash the towel and you can use your fingers to pick it off.

IMPORTANT! These files are for PERSONAL use only! Please see the ⬥⬥TERMS OF USE⬥⬥ outlined below.

WHAT'S INCLUDED... a high-resolution 300dpi PNG file with an sRGB color profile and transparent background. This file is great for t-shirts, mugs, wall decals, pillows, posters, phone cases, or any Print then Cuts (see below).

⬥⬥This digital file is intended for printing, however, if you have a Cricut Maker, or Cricut Explore, and a home printer (or access to a color printer), you will be able to print and cut this design using the “Print Then Cut” feature in Design Space. I have provided two links for reference that will assist you in using this file for this purpose. The first is from the Cricut help files:

https://help.cricut.com/hc/en-us/articles/360009387274-How-do-I-Print-Then-Cut-in-Design-Space-

and the second is an easy to read and follow tutorial that I found online (I have no affiliation with this blogger)

https://www.daydreamintoreality.com/print-then-cut-cricut/

⬥⬥This digital art file can be used for:
.: Scrapbooking
.: Cut machines (print first)
.: Vinyl decals, stickers
.: Clothes printing
.: Printable decoration
.: Cards and invitations design
.: Iron-on transfers
.: Engraving
.: and so much more…

As every viewing device is different, please keep in mind that color may vary in your printed product versus what is seen on a mobile device or computer.

⬥⬥You are NOT purchasing a shirt, and nothing will be shipped to you. This listing is for a digital file that will be available for immediate download upon completion of your payment. Please note that if you do not have an Etsy account the file will be emailed to you directly from Etsy. You will need to understand basic computer and printing functions to use this file. If you are unsure how to print the file, please refer to the instructions provided to you by the manufacturer of your computer and/or printer.

⬥⬥TERMS OF USE⬥⬥
This file is for PERSONAL USE only. You may not sell prints (on shirts, coffee mugs, etc.), transfers, decals, or stickers containing this design. This includes using a POD company to print and ship shirts and other products with this design on Etsy, eBay and other platforms.

You are NOT allowed to use this design on any Print on Demand sites, including, but not limited to Zazzle, CafePress, Printful, and Amazon Merch.

You are NOT allowed to use this design in part or whole to create any new digital design to sell. This includes, but is not limited to SVG, Embroidery design, clipart, or anything of this nature. If you are unsure, please contact me prior to purchase.

⬥⬥REFUNDS & EXCHANGES⬥⬥
Due to the digital nature of this design, neither a refund nor exchange is accepted.

Please do not hesitate to contact me, before or after purchase with any questions or comments you may have. I'll do my best to help. Customer satisfaction is very important to me! I appreciate your business.

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love. Any colour and size. Vinyl wall art decal sticker quote.(#128)
results.description:
MATERIAL: Made from high quality self adhesive sign vinyl, suitable for both internal and exterior use in all weather conditions. All our decals are contour cut from solid colour vinyl, which means you will not have that transparent film effect across the decal surface and edges. 

CAN BE APPLIED TO: Most smooth or low textured surfaces from painted plaster walls, windows, doors, vehicles and more. 

REVERSED: Your decal can be reversed/mirrored for different positioning or for purpose of applying on the inside of glass for external viewing, such as shop windows. State upon checkout if you require it to be reversed.

SIZE: We offer a variety of sizes. Where possible we will try and make these in as fewer pieces as possible, however some of the larger sizes or decals with multiple layers or colours will come in sections for joining or layering when applying to the surface. 

COLOUR: Select your colour from the colour options menu. If your decal has more than one colour detailed in the listing picture, please state all your colour choices for each section in the note to seller box upon checkout. 

TEXT: If your decal includes customised text, please write you text in the text box exactly how you would like it written, including upper and lower case letters and any punctuation marks. 

FURTHER CUSTOMISATION: If there is any further requirement needed such as a change to the design, bespoke size or a specific vinyl finish or colour, please contact us with your request prior to purchase as some changes may incur an extra cost.

***IMPORTANT DELIVERY INFORMATION FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERS***: We offer a choice of delivery options to suit all budgets. 

If you need your product within a timely manner we highly recommend using one of the UPS options which are fully tracked, faster and more reliable with their delivery estimates. 

Our cheapest standard international delivery option is via Royal Mail, NON TRACKABLE and their delivery estimates are usually less reliable and have been known to go over by several weeks, especially during busy periods such as Christmas. Parcels are rarely lost but please be cautious with this option if you are eager to receive it quickly or need your parcel by a set date. 

Full details on all shipping options, including processes for delays and lost parcels can be found within delivery policy section, by clicking on the ‘view shop policies’ text on this listing. 

RETURNS: As all of our decals are custom made to order, they are non-returnable unless faulty. We are however here to help if you have a problem, so please contact us to discuss any issues you may encounter.
